patthana15.28:1.1: Anidassanaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Akusalaṁ kusalasadisaṁ.)
patthana15.28:2.1: Anidassanaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassano naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.28:3.1: Appaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.28:4.1: Appaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.28:5.1: Abyākate paccayavasena ekaṁ. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
